tagline: Isixazululo sakho esiphelele sokukhokha ngedijithali, amarisidi, nama-invoyisi eNingizimu Afrika.
securityMessage: Sisebenzisa izindlela zokubethela nokuphepha zesimanje ukuvikela imininingwane yakho yezezimali. Ukwethenjwa kwakho kuyinto eza kuqala kithi.
noInvoicesYet: Awekho ama-invoyisi okwamanje. Dala elilodwa ukuze uqalise!
budgetWiselyDesc: Landelela imali yakho engenayo nezindleko. Dala isabelomali sanyanga zonke futhi unamathele kuso ukuze ufinyelele imigomo yakho yezezimali.
saveRegularlyDesc: Ngisho namanani amancane ongwa njalo angakhula kakhulu ngokuhamba kwesikhathi. Yenza ukonga kwakho kuzenzekele uma kungenzeka.
understandDebtDesc: Phatha izikweletu ngempumelelo. Beka eqhulwini ukukhokha izikweletu ezinenzalo ephezulu kuqala. Gwema ukuboleka ngokungadingekile.
investForFutureDesc: Funda ngezinketho ezahlukene zokutshala imali. Qala kusenesikhathi ukuze uzuze ekubuyisweni kwemali eyinkimbinkimbi.
personalizedAdviceDesc: Cabangela ukubonana nomeluleki wezezimali ukuze uthole isiqondiso esihambisana nesimo sakho esithile.
planDescription: Jabulela izinkokhelo ezingenazihibe nokuphathwa kwamarisidi edijithali.

auth.forgotPasswordInstruction: Faka ikheli lakho le-imeyili sizokuthumelela isixhumanisi sokusetha kabusha iphasiwedi yakho.
auth.passwordResetEmailSent: I-imeyili yokusetha kabusha iphasiwedi ithunyelwe. Sicela uhlole ibhokisi lakho lokungenayo.
auth.mustBeLoggedInToUpdatePassword: Kufanele ungene ngemvume ukuze ubuyekeze iphasiwedi yakho kusuka lapha. Uma ukhohlwe iphasiwedi yakho, sicela usebenzise isixhumanisi 'Ukhohlwe Iphasiwedi' ekhasini lokungena.
auth.mustBeLoggedIn: Kufanele ungene ngemvume ukuze wenze lesi senzo.
auth.verificationEmailSent: I-imeyili yokuqinisekisa ithunyelwe ekhelini lakho. Sicela uchofoze isixhumanisi esiku-imeyili ukuze uvule i-akhawunti yakho.
auth.changePasswordDescription: Faka iphasiwedi yakho entsha ngezansi. Qiniseka ukuthi inamandla!
auth.changeLanguageDescription: Khetha ulimi lwakho oluthandayo lohlelo lokusebenza.

toast.signupSuccessDescriptionCheckEmail: Sicela uhlole i-imeyili yakho ukuze uqinisekise i-akhawunti yakho ngaphambi kokungena.

error.passwordTooShort: Iphasiwedi kufanele okungenani ibe nezinhlamvu eziyi-6.
error.genericError: Kwenzeke iphutha elingalindelekile. Sicela uzame futhi.

supabaseErrors.Invalid login credentials: I-imeyili noma iphasiwedi ayilungile. Sicela uzame futhi.
supabaseErrors.User already registered: I-akhawunti enale imeyili isivele ikhona. Zama ukungena noma sebenzisa 'Ukhohlwe Iphasiwedi'.
supabaseErrors.Email rate limit exceeded: Imizamo eminingi kakhulu. Sicela uzame futhi ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.
supabaseErrors.Password should be at least 6 characters: Iphasiwedi kufanele okungenani ibe nezinhlamvu eziyi-6.
supabaseErrors.Unable to validate email address: invali: Ifomethi ye-imeyili ayilungile. Sicela ufake ikheli le-imeyili elivumelekile.
supabaseErrors.For security purposes, you can only requ: Isicelo sokusetha kabusha iphasiwedi sithunyelwe kamuva nje. Sicela ulinde umzuzu ngaphambi kokuzama futhi.

p2p.recipientHint: Faka i-imeyili noma inombolo yocingo yomamukeli.
p2p.notePlaceholder: isb., Okwesidlo sasemini, Usuku Olumnandi Lokuzalwa!
p2p.paymentSentError: Yehlulekile ukuthumela inkokhelo. Sicela uzame futhi.

error.invalidAmount: Sicela ufake isamba esivumelekile esingaphezu kuka-zero.

error.stripeNotLoaded: I-Stripe ayikalayisheki. Sicela ulinde bese uzama futhi.
error.paymentFailed: Inkokhelo yehlulekile. Sicela uhlole imininingwane yekhadi lakho noma zama elinye ikhadi.
error.dbErrorAfterSuccess: Inkokhelo iphumelele nge-Stripe, kodwa yehlulekile ukurekhoda ohlelweni lwethu. Sicela uxhumane nosekelo.
error.failedToCreatePaymentIntent: Yehlulekile ukuqalisa inkokhelo. Sicela uzame futhi.

merchantPayment.securityNoteMessage: Ngenhloso yokubonisa, ukwakhiwa kwenhloso yokukhokha kulingiswa ohlangothini lweklayenti. Kuhlelo lokusebenza lwangempela, lesi sinyathelo esibucayi KUFANELE sisingathwe ngokuphephile kuseva engemuva ukuvikela ukhiye wakho oyimfihlo we-Stripe.
